title: (x) "Eyeful" 50's font - Broadway {Nathan, Adriano}
content:
Is there a free version of this font?   
  
 [http://www.btinternet.com/%7Ebrmerc/girlie/eyelink.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20140317033050/http:/www.btinternet.com/%7Ebrmerc/girlie/eyelink.JPG)  
   
or   
   
http://www.btinternet.com/%7Ebrmerc/girlie/flirtlink.JPG   
  
Or something similar?
author: friet

comments.content: The second one looks like [Broadway](http://web.archive.org/web/20140317033050/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/broadway/broadway/testdrive.html?s=Flirt&p=48), but that's not free.
First one is also Broadway, sloped and stretched.
